name: LoopChan
description:
LoopChan is a curious bot

It constantly brake and gets stuck in a loop of movements

When this happens, we must take it for maintenance

There it is necessary to move the belt at the right time

so that it does not destroy itself

Ludum Dare Game Page How to Play 🎮

• The bot is stuck, you can't control it

• Press space to move the belt

• Use the beats to guide you

Team ⚒️

• Euler Moises: 🎵 Audio 🎨 Art

• Felipe Inoue: 💻 Code

• Kaish: 📐 Game Design

Game developed for Ludum Dare 47 - October 2020
Theme: "Stuck in a Loop"  🕹️
